AND EntCode=#{EntCode}
AND StampName LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
UseYn EntName StampName FileInfo OrderNo OrderNo ASC ,RegDate
ASC DESC
ORDER BY OrderNo ASC, RegDate DESC
